entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Regina
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:33 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Clear, -29.3°C

entry.title: Thursday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 24.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 43 this morning and minus 32 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Mainly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 18 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h this evening. Temperature rising to minus 18 by morning. Wind chill minus 36 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023
